column1: Camocim de São Félix is a city located in the state of Pernambuco
column2: Brazil. Located  at 113.7 km away from Recife
column3: capital of the state of Pernambuco. Has an estimated (Ibge 2009) population of 16.574 inhabitants.

column1: Boundaries - Sairé   (N and E);  Bonito  and São Joaquim do Monte  (S);  Bezerros   (W)
The main economic activities in Camocim de São Félix are based in agribusiness
column3: passion fruits; and livestock such as cattle
